a.div: Norwalk Schools Are Marzano Lev. 1 Certified

div.a: Proposed Norwalk Physical Education & Competition Center (NPECC) Construction Project & Special Bond Election

div.div: Can you name a teacher who profoundly impacted your life?

em.strong: Teachers are the influential part of learning.

div.p: Everything we do starts with the teacher. To help them be incredibly successful, we devote more time to professional development, put technology in their hands, and empower them to make a difference.

div.h2: Put meaningful technology in everyone's hands
div.div: Each teacher has a laptop computer and all our buildings maintain a better than 2:1 ratio of students to computers. Three of our buildings are 1:1.
Schools are now required to report information on student performance. We’re eager to show our results.

div.h3: It's always something exciting happening at Norwalk Schools.
div.p: Norwalk Warriors are always working, creating, and innovating. Our students are involved everyday with different activities designed to showcase their many talents.
